summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein & Co. Inc. for transportation and special handling charges. The invoice details the services provided, including the total amount due and payment instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the owner of the account associated with the invoice for FedEx services.

locations: 358 El Brillo Way, Palm Beach, FL 33480
keyFacts: Total charges on the invoice amount to $30.70.
The invoice includes transportation charges of $20.70 and special handling charges of $10.00.
The invoice indicates that charges were initially billed to a different payer and will now be rebilled to Jeffrey Epstein's account.
The invoice references a package picked up on December 16, 1998, and delivered on December 17, 1998.
